name: Sumo-Caffeine
description:
Tea vs Coffee.

A terrible reality of if you favor coffee or tea can finally be solved by a battle to the death. 

The game has two teams you can pick, different mugs to choose, and a tournament you must win every match in. The only catch is that this is a game with a weird idea, so there has to be some intense game play so..... good luck! Anyway, have fun playing Sumo-Caffeine.

Personally from Keyboard Games, thank you! :)
